statements: UPDATE courses SET instructor_name = 'John Doe' WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE courses SET course_name = 'Math' WHERE course_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890';
UPDATE courses SET course_name = 'Programming 101', instructor_name = 'John Doe' WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE courses SET course_description = 'Advanced Programming Concepts', course_name = 'Programming 202' WHERE course_id = '98765432-abcd-ef12-3456-7890fedc0987';
UPDATE Courses SET course_name='Mathematics', course_description='Study of numbers and patterns' WHERE course_id=1;
UPDATE Students SET student_email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE student_name='John Doe';
UPDATE Courses SET course_name = 'Advanced Math', course_description = 'Advanced mathematics course' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE Students SET student_name = 'Jane Doe', student_email = 'jane.doe@example.com' WHERE student_id = 5;
UPDATE course_materials SET course_name='Mathematics', course_description='Advanced Math Course' WHERE course_id=1
UPDATE students SET student_birthdate='2000-05-15', student_name='Alice Smith' WHERE student_id=2

UPDATE students SET enrollment_date = '2022-05-10' WHERE id = 3;

UPDATE students SET enrollment_date = '2022-01-15', email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE id = 2

UPDATE course_materials SET material_url='http://example.com/material.pdf' WHERE material_id=201;
